sub_title: business & operations consultant / creative services / culture research
summary:
Consultant focused on the development and production of projects within the creative and technology services industries. I have researched and implemented solutions across multiple sectors including data analysis, business process mapping, system implementation roadmaps, and content production strategies. I’m known for my versatility and amicable attitude to create positive working atmospheres and exceed expectations.

You can find me coordinating simultaneous projects at the Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam. Earlier, I was proudly part of business and IT consulting teams in Monterrey, Vancouver, Madison and Kuala Lumpur. 

creative services - data & tech services - project production - supply chain & logistics

projects.title: AirPaths: Dynamic Air Traffic System; The future of UAV commercial delivery logistics
projects.description:
AirPaths is a future-thinking project that provides a precise, three-dimensional airspace planning alternative that considers different factors including weather, urban infrastructure, and drone traffic in a 3D coordinate map. Going from quadrants to octants to provide an accurate tracking software that enables safer pathways inside urban settings. Achieving the disruption of traditional air traffic systems by making drone deliveries possible in cities. In addition, we aid natural disaster areas with relief outreach.

Sustainable Development Goals:
9) Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
11) Sustainable Cities and Communities

projects.title: Hult Prize 2017 - Meera
projects.description: 'Meera' is an e-commerce platform that prospers the opportunities of refugees escaping conflict and violence in their home country to become self-reliant in their host country; generating their own income. Meera enables partnerships between artists and refugees to creating products from upcycling that tell their personal stories through online profiles where people all over the world can get to know them. Our catalog of products creatively reuses boats, lifejackets, and other fabrics.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.description:

• Presented a strategic roadmap to improve and future-proof the platform's user experience.
profile_positions.title: Research Project

profile_positions.description:
• Completed qualitative mixed-methods research (incl. desk research, interviews, workshops) for B2C and B2B projects.
• Project outputs: sourcing cultural experts, cultural analyses, competitor analyses and client communications.
• Themes: youth culture, Generation Z, streaming television, food and drink. 
• Markets: Netherlands, Sweden, Spain, Germany, Poland, US, Mexico, among others.
